    ActorDao
     
    BaseDao<T extends AbstractEntity>
     
    BlockFetch<T>
    Provides the functionality for loading of data for a given set of IDs with a minimal amount of queries but with block sizes of ID sets that are not greater than the allowed maximum list size for queries (see BaseDao.MAX_LIST_SIZE).
